data.title: Kyle Coleman on LinkedIn: #sales #sdr #revenue
data.meta_description:
I'd love to never see this in my inbox ever again:

😔 “I’m really sorry to bother you”
🤒 “I feel horrible troubling you”
😬 “Don’t hate me for emailing you”… | 68 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

I'd love to never see this in my inbox ever again: 😔 “I’m really sorry to bother you” 🤒 “I feel horrible troubling you” 😬 “Don’t hate me for emailing you” I get at least a couple of these emails every week. And it always bums me out. ——— Sellers, please take this advice: Don’t feel bad for doing your job. You don’t need to apologize for attempting to pique my interest in your solution. What you do need to do is research me and my company. Understand what’s most top of mind for me and what problems I’m facing. Then show me how your solution can solve those problems. If you’re intentional with your outreach, if you show me you understand my universe, and if you can resonate with things that are top of mind, then you have nothing to apologize for. You're critical to driving revenue for you company. Don't lose sight of that fact. ✊ #sales #sdr #revenue
